title: Collections and Collection Market
content: Added Collections and a new Collection Market. You can now complete collections for rewards and trade collection items.

title: Unlockable items in databank
content: Added Unlockable items in databank. You can now see which items are unlockable and how to obtain them.

title: Merging Items Collectibles
content: You can now merge collectible items to create rarer and more valuable items. Check your collection for mergeable items.

title: EXP Requirements Update
content: We have rebalanced the EXP requirements for leveling up to provide a smoother progression.
